participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, loves to connect with others. Enjoys sharing experiences and finding common interests.
participant_1.background: I like watching tv in my free time as well. Food and water are essential to me in life. I like to play sports and get fresh air. I have been in 2 car crashes in my life.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, enjoys outdoor activities and trying new things. Has a playful side and appreciates humor.
participant_2.background: I have brown hair. I hate carrots. I wear contacts. I love bicycling.

content.text: Hi! I'm glad to meet you.
Hi! Me too!
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch TV, play sports, and get fresh air.
That sounds like me! I love watching TV, too. What are some of your favorite shows?
I like to watch comedies, dramas, and reality TV.
Me too! What are some of your favorite dramas?
I like "This is Us", "The Big Bang Theory", and "Grey's Anatomy".
I love "This is Us"! I haven't watched the other two shows, but I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both great shows.
What kind of sports do you like to play?
I like to play basketball, soccer, and volleyball.
I love basketball! I used to play it all the time when I was younger.
Me too! I still play it when I can.
What kind of fresh air activities do you like to do?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping.
I love hiking! I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who likes the same things I do.
